title: Early Recollections and Life of Dr. James Still
description: Dr. James Still (1812-1885) Reproduced from the original autobiography printed in 1877 by J.B. Lippincott, this facsimile edition contains, in addition, a bill in Dr. Still's handwriting and an engraving of the office where this self-taught son of slaves dispensed his famous herb remedies.
author: James    Still
